name: No Eyes Sees You
description:
No Eyes Sees You * * Accursed

You were sent here to defy the curse that plague your dreams and destroyed your life. 

* Who is watching ?

A giant eye seems to create monsters out of thin air that hunts you down and make your life a nightmare.

* Break the curse !

Find how to break it by interacting with your environement and all who is also locked in this place.
